Submodules¶

media_manager.plugins.common.fileops.FileMover module¶

class media_manager.plugins.common.fileops.FileMover.FileMover[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that contains static methods to help move files

static move_file(file, location)[source]¶

Moves a file to a new location. :param location: the new location of the file :param file: the file to be moved :return: void

media_manager.plugins.common.fileops.FileRenamer module¶

class media_manager.plugins.common.fileops.FileRenamer.FileRenamer[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that contains static methods to help rename files

static rename_file(file, new_name)[source]¶

Renames a file to a new file name, keeping the extension and file path. :param file: the file to be renamed :param new_name: the new name of the file
